availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Williamson (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Bath County, Kentucky, native. Married to Ardena Storms Williamson in Bath County, Kentucky, on September 25, 1851. Father of Sarah Williamson, Joel Williamson, Roland Williamson, Rosa Williamson, Thomas Williamson, Willis Williamson, George Williamson, Stephen Williamson, and Coleman Williamson. Farmer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 48.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Mudlick, p. 38B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film 005552763, p. 194.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994028, Bath County Births.
"James Williamson (1827-1905)," Find A Grave, Memorial 10055782, accessed September 28, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/10055782.
